p.s: my name is Jane and I want to express my feelings about your speech in 2021 at the climate summit in Glasgow towards you.
Then you said it is possible to stop the climate change and if you do not act the following generations will be angry.
He said he will not let us down.
But in my opinion you let us down.
You and your colleagues were responsible to change something!
You had the chance to stop global warming and climate change.
But if we look how it is right now, we have to say it is worse than ever before: tornadostornadoes, flood disasters, heat, climate refugiesrefugees, pandemics and so on.
These are consequences the scientists of your time warrant you and your colleagues of.
But you just thought about the next elections and you were scared of the economy and its influence.
As you said the following generations ARE angry!
You are responsible for all the pain in this world, but WE have to live with that.
